header.title: Izixhobo zeSalatiso ze-OHS
sidebar.step_0.title: ðŸ“œ Wamkelekile kwiZixhobo zeSalatiso ze-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Hlola izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezixhobo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: âš¡ Ngaba uyazi ukusebenzisa abanikezeli abanobuqotho abanokuthi banciphise iingozi emsebenzini ngokuqinisekisa ukuba umsebenzi wenziwe ngexesha kwaye ngokomgangatho ophezulu kunye nemigangatho yokhuseleko?
intro.title: Wamkelekile kwiZixhobo zeSalatiso ze-OHS
intro.description: Hlola izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezixhobo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini.
legal_obligations.client.title: Izibophelelo zoMthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Lungiselela uVavanyo lweNgxaki eSisiseko (BRA) echonga iingozi zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Nikezela ngeNkcazo yeMpilo noKhuseleko echaza iimfuno ezithile zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Yamkela iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko soMsebenzi ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Izibophelelo zoMsebenzi
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Ngenisa iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko esisekelwe kwinkcazo yomthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Gcina iFayile yeMpilo noKhuseleko esizeni enazo zonke iingxelo ezifunekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Qhuba uVavanyo lweNgxaki kunye noVavanyo lokuChonga iNgxaki (HIRA) ngokukodwa kumsebenzi.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Izibophelelo zoMsebenzi we-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): AbaSebenzeli (PrCHSA) balawula i-H&S egameni lomthengi, beqinisekisa ukuthotyelwa.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) ancedisa abakontraka ekusebenziseni nasekuphononongeni iinkqubo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Imihlahlandlela ye-SACPCMP: Kufuneka igcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD zezikhundla zobungcali.
wizard.step_0: Nceda ukhethe isenzo ukuze uqale inkqubo.
wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwe-9: Ufuna ukwenza ntoni?
wizard.step_1.label: Khetha amaXwebhu oza kuwadibanisa (Khetha zonke ezisebenzayo):
wizard.step_1.error: Nceda ukhethe okungenani uxwebhu olulodwa lokudibanisa.
wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwe-9: Iinkcukacha zoMthengi
wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwe-9: Ingaba uMsebenzi uQeshiwe?
wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwe-9: Iinkcukacha zoMsebenzi
wizard.step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwe-9: Iinkcukacha zeProjekthi
wizard.step_6.title: Inyathelo 6 kwe-9: Ubungakanani beProjekthi
wizard.step_7.title: Inyathelo 7 kwe-9: Idityaniswe ngu
wizard.step_8.title: Inyathelo 8 kwe-9: Idityaniswe ukuze
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Nceda uchaze ukuba uxwebhu ludityaniselwe bani.
wizard.step_9.title: Inyathelo 9 kwe-9: Phonononga kwaye Yongeza kwiCart
wizard.step_9.description: Phonononga ukhetho lwakho kwaye yongeza amaxwebhu kwi-cart yakho ukuze uqhubeke.
cart.title: I-Cart Yakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo yeReferensi ye-Invoice: (Isebenza iintsuku ezisi-7. Bhalisa ukuze ugcine ngokungapheliyo!)
resources.title: Qhagamshelana neeNgcali ze-H&S eziVunyiweyo
resources.description: Ngaba ufuna uncedo lobungcali? Qhagamshelana neengcali ezivunyiweyo ngeemfuno zeprojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, iArhente ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: PR12345 - UQhagamshelwano: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Igosa le-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: CHSO67890 - UQhagamshelwano: john.smith@example.com
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 Izixhobo zeSalatiso ze-OHS. Onke amalungelo agciniwe.
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyekile
chatbot.response: Ndilapha ukuze ndikuncede! Ukuze ufumane iingcebiso ze-OHS ezizezakho, nceda uqhagamshelane nengcali.
training.title: Uqeqesho lweNdawo yoMsebenzi oluBanzi
training.description: Hlola iinkqubo zethu zoqeqesho zendawo yomsebenzi ezibanzi ukuze uqinisekise ukuthotyelwa kwemithetho yaseMzantsi Afrika ye-OHS kwaye ukhuthaze indawo yokusebenza ekhuselekileyo. Khetha uqeqesho olusebenzayo, uqeqesho lweqela, okanye usebenzise i-wizard yethu ukuze ufumane iingcebiso ezilungiselelwe wena ngokusekelwe kushishino lwakho, abaphulaphuli abajoliswe kubo, kunye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Nceda ukhethe inketho ukuze uqale inkqubo yengcebiso yoqeqesho.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwe-5: Khetha uShishino Lwakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: uShishino:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwe-5: Khetha Abaphulaphuli Abajoliswe Kubo
training.wizard.step_2.label: Abaphulaphuli Abajoliswe Kubo (Khetha zonke ezisebenzayo):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Nceda ukhethe okungenani abaphulaphuli abajoliswe kubo abanye.
training.wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwe-5: Chaza Indawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwe-5: Iikhrayitheriya ezoNgezelelweyo
training.wizard.step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwe-5: Phonononga uQeqesho oluCetyiswayo
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kwizinto ozingenisileyo, nazi iinkqubo zoqeqesho ezicetyiswayo. Khetha ezo ufuna ukuzongeza kwi-cart yakho.
training.cart.title: I-Cart Yakho yoQeqesho
training.cart.customization.title: Lungiselela iMathiriyali Yakho yoQeqesho
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Nceda ufake igama lomntu oncedisa kuqala.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Nceda ufake inombolo yoqhagamshelwano yongxamiseko esebenzayo (umz., +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Idityaniswe ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela yoQeqesho
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela yoNgeniso:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: I-SafetyHelp Disclaimer: Iimathiriyali zoqeqesho ezinikezelweyo zezolwazi kuphela kwaye aziboneleli ngengcebiso yobungcali. Ukuze ufumane izisombululo ze-OHS ezilungiselelwe wena, qhagamshelana ne-SafetyHelp kwi support@safetyhelp.co.za okanye undwendwele Iphepha loQhagamshelwano.
training.checkout.success: Intlawulo iphumelele! Iimathiriyali zakho zoqeqesho zenziwe. Khuphela ii-PDF zakho ngezantsi. Ukuze ufumane uqeqesho lwe-intanethi, iikhowudi zokungena zithunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyile.
training.providers.title: AbaNikezeli boQeqesho abaVunyiweyo
training.providers.description: Ngaba ufuna uqeqesho lomntu? Qhagamshelana nabanikezeli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo ngeemfuno zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Ivunywe yi-SETA - Igxile kuNcedo lokuQala, ukuCima uMlilo - UQhagamshelwano: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe kwi-SACPCMP - Igxile kuKhuseleko lweSakhiwo - UQhagamshelwano: training@safeskills.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga iManuwali yoQeqesho eLungisekayo
training.manual.purchase.description: Fumana imanuwali yoqeqesho ebanzi elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, ebandakanya iimfuno zomthetho, umxholo okhethekileyo wenkampani ngokusekelwe kwiprofayile yakho yengozi, kunye nezikowuti ezivela kubanikezeli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza iProfayile Yakho yeNgxaki yoQeqesho lweManuwali
training.manual.risk_profile.label: IProfayile yeNgxaki:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho yoQeqesho
training.legal_fact.step_1: Inyaniso yoMthetho: UMthetho we-OHS uMhlathi 8 ufuna ukuba abaqeshi banikeze uqeqesho olulungiselelwe iingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenza.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Inyaniso eMnandi: Ngaba uyazi ukuba uqeqesho rhoqo lunokunciphisa iziganeko zendawo yokusebenza ukuya kuthi ga kwi-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Inyaniso yoMthetho: Oomasipala bendawo banokuba nemithetho eyahlukileyo ye-OHS echaphazela iimfuno zoqeqesho.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Inyaniso eMnandi: Iindawo zokusebenza ezinengozi ephezulu njengeziza zokwakha zifuna uqeqesho rhoqo ukuze kugcinwe imigangatho yokhuseleko.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Inyaniso yoMthetho: UMthetho we-OHS uyanyanzelisa uqeqesho oluthile lweendima ezifana nabameli be-SHE ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthotyelwa.
legislation.title: Umthetho we-OHS kunye noLawulo lweNgxaki
legislation.description: Yenza umthetho we-OHS kunye nesicwangciso solawulo lwengozi esilungiselelwe ishishini lakho. Faka iinkcukacha zenkampani yakho, imisebenzi, kunye neengozi ukuze ufumane ingxelo ebanzi yokuthotyelwa equka umthetho waseMzantsi Afrika, imithetho kamasipala, kunye nemigangatho yamazwe ngamazwe.
legislation.wizard.title: Yenza i-RMP Yakho
legislation.wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwe-4: Iinkcukacha zeNkampani
legislation.wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwe-4: Imisebenzi
legislation.wizard.step_2.label: Khetha Imisebenzi (Khetha zonke ezisebenzayo):
legislation.wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwe-4: Iingozi
legislation.wizard.step_3.label: Khetha Iingozi (Khetha zonke ezisebenzayo):
legislation.wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwe-4: Phonononga kwaye Yenza
legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Phonononga izinto ozingenisileyo kwaye yenza i-RMP yakho. Ungongeza umthetho owongezelelweyo ukuba uyafuna.
legislation.wizard.step_4.additional_leg: Faka nawuphi na umthetho owongezelelweyo apha...
legislation.cart.title: Ukuhlawula
legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho yenziwe! Sebenzisa ikhowudi yevawutsha FREERMP2025 ukuze ukhuphele simahla (abasebenzisi bokuqala abali-100).
suppliers.title: Uluhlu lwaBanikezeli be-OHS
suppliers.description: Fumana kwaye ubeke abanikezeli be-OHS eMzantsi Afrika. Khangela ngendawo, iinkonzo, kunye nezivumelekile. Ngenisa uphononongo ukuze uncede abanye benze izigqibo ezinolwazi.
suppliers.list.title: Uluhlu lwaBanikezeli
suppliers.table.name: Igama loMboneleli
suppliers.review_form.title: Ngenisa uPhononongo
community_tools.title: Izixhobo zoKhuseleko loLuntu
community_tools.description: Xela nasiphi na isiganeko sokhuseleko okanye ingozi kuluntu lwakho okanye kwindawo yakho yokusebenza, ukusuka kwimingxuma ukuya kwizixhobo ezineziphene. Sebenzisa izixhobo zethu ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko kwiindawo ezifana neevenkile ze-spaza, izikolo, izibhedlele, kunye neethaveni.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Xela iSiganeko okanye iNgozi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza isiganeko okanye ingozi (umz., umngxuma kuMain Street, isihlalo esaphukileyo kwiziko loluntu)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Isibambiso Sakho seMidiya yoLuntu (Ngokuzikhethela, umz., @username kwi-X):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka ifowuni okanye i-imeyile (izaliswa ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umnikezeli ukhethiwe)...
Isibambiso seMidiya yoLuntu soMnikezeli weNkonzo (Ngokuzikhethela, umz., @CityofJoburgZA kwi-X):
Faka isibambiso se-X (sizaliswa ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umnikezeli ukhethiwe)...
community_tools.list.title: Ezinye Izixhobo zoKhuseleko loLuntu
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Uluhlu lwe-OHS lweVenkile ye-Spaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Qinisekisa ukuba ivenkile yakho ye-spaza iyahlangabezana neemfuno zokhuseleko lomlilo, zombane, kunye nesakhiwo ngokwemigaqo kamasipala kunye noMthetho we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Isikhokelo soKhuseleko loMlilo seSikolo
community_tools.list.school.description: Funda iimfuno zomthetho zokhuseleko lomlilo ezikolweni, kubandakanya izicwangciso zokukhutshwa kunye nezixhobo.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Isikhokelo sokuLungiselela iNgxamiseko seSibhedlele
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Qinisekisa ukuba izibhedlele zilungiselelwe iimeko zongxamiseko ngezicwangciso zokukhutshwa ezifanelekileyo kunye nezixhobo zokhuseleko.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Uluhlu lwe-OHS lweTavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Qinisekisa ukuba iithaveni ziyahlangabezana nemithetho yokhuseleko lomlilo kunye nolawulo lwezihlwele ukuthintela iziganeko.
dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi yamaLungu
dashboard.welcome: Wamkelekile, [Igama loMsebenzisi]! Lawula ukuthotyelwa kwakho kwe-OHS, ii-RMPs, uphononongo lwabanikezeli, kunye neengxelo zoluntu apha.
dashboard.profile.title: Iprofayile yeNkampani
dashboard.rmps.title: Ii-RMPs eziGciniweyo
dashboard.supplier_reviews.title: Uphononongo lwaBanikezeli
dashboard.incident_reports.title: Iingxelo zeZiganeko
document_categories.title: Dibanisa amaXwebhu eNkqubo yoLawulo lwe-OHS Yakho
document_categories.description: Khetha kwaye udibanise amaxwebhu oza kuwadinga kwinkqubo yakho yolawulo lwe-OHS. Khetha kwiimigaqo-nkqubo, iinkqubo, imigangatho, nokunye, okulungiselelwe iimfuno zombutho wakho.
document_categories.policies.title: Imigaqo-nkqubo
document_categories.policies.description: Iingxelo zomgomo ophezulu kunye nokuzibophelela, ezivunyiweyo ngabaphathi abaphezulu.
document_categories.policies.infectious_: Umgaqo-nkqubo wokuSulelwa kwe-COVID-19 okanye iZifo eziSulelayo
document_categories.policies.ohs_perform: Umgaqo-nkqubo wokuSebenza, uPhononongo, kunye neeNjongo ze-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_communi: Umgaqo-nkqubo woNxibelelwano, ukuThatha iNxaxheba, kunye noKubonisana kwe-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_workpla: Umgaqo-nkqubo weMpilo kwaye iNtlalontle yeNdawo yoMsebenzi ye-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_documen: Umgaqo-nkqubo woLawulo lwaMaxwebhu kunye neeRekhodi ze-OHS
document_categories.procedures.title: Iinkqubo
document_categories.procedures.descripti: Izikhokelo zenyathelo ngenyathelo zokwenza imisebenzi ngokukhuselekileyo nangokungaguqukiyo.
document_categories.procedures.hira_proc: Inkqubo yokuChonga iNgozi kunye noVavanyo lweNgxaki (HIRA)
document_categories.procedures.first_aid: Inkqubo yoNcedo lokuQala kunye neNgxamiseko yoNyango
document_categories.standards.title: Imigangatho/Izikhokelo
document_categories.standards.descriptio: Imigangatho yangaphakathi ehambelana nomthetho okanye imigangatho yoshishino, echaza iimeko ezilindelekileyo okanye ukuziphatha.
document_categories.standards.housekeepi: Umgangatho wokuGcina iNdawo kunye noLawulo lweNkunkuma
document_categories.standards.hygiene_fa: Umgangatho weZiko loCoceko (iithoyilethi, amanzi, iindawo zokuphumla)

document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.standards.ohs_perfor: Umgangatho wokuSebenza, uPhononongo, kunye neeNjongo ze-OHS
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.standards.ohs_commun: Umgangatho woNxibelelwano, ukuThatha iNxaxheba, kunye noKubonisana kwe-OHS
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.standards.ohs_workpl: Umgangatho weMpilo kwaye iNtlalontle yeNdawo yoMsebenzi ye-OHS
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.standards.ohs_docume: Umgangatho woLawulo lwaMaxwebhu kunye neeRekhodi ze-OHS
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.registers_logs.title: Iirejista kunye neeLogi
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.registers_logs.descr: Iirekhodi ezihlaziywa rhoqo zokulandela umkhondo kunye nokulandeleka.
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.templates_forms.desc: Amaxwebhu alungiselelwe kwangaphambili ukuze kuqokelelwe kwaye kulungelelaniswe igalelo.
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.templates_forms.fit_: Ifomu yokuLungela uMsebenzi / uVavanyo lokuBuya eMsebenzini
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.templates_forms.ohs_: Iifomu kunye noLuhlu lwePhicotho kunye noHlolo lwe-OHS
Iifomu zokuXela iSiganeko kunye noPhando lwe-OHS
Iifomu kunye neeTempleyiti zoLawulo lwabaSebenzi be-OHS
Iifomu kunye neeTempleyiti zokuSebenza, uPhononongo, kunye neeNjongo ze-OHS
Iifomu kunye neeTempleyiti zoLawulo lweeNdawo zokuLawula i-OHS
Iifomu kunye neeTempleyiti zoNxibelelwano, ukuThatha iNxaxheba, kunye noKubonisana kwe-OHS
Iifomu kunye neeTempleyiti zeMpilo kwaye iNtlalontle yeNdawo yoMsebenzi ye-OHS
Iifomu kunye neeTempleyiti zoLawulo lweNdalo ye-OHS
Iifomu kunye neeTempleyiti zoLawulo lwaMaxwebhu kunye neeRekhodi ze-OHS
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.permits.title: Iimvume
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.permits.description: Izimvume ezilawulwayo zemisebenzi enengozi ephezulu okanye ethintelweyo.
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.records.title: Iirekhodi
document_categories.standards.emergency_.document_categories.records.description: Amaxwebhu agqityiweyo abonisa ukuphunyezwa kunye nokuthotyelwa.
